nodes.text: Special Agent was a rank used by several organizations.
During the Cold War, it was used by the Republic Strategic Information Service and ranked above Agent and below Bureau Chief.
It was also a position in the Senate Bureau of Intelligence, held by Wullf Yularen.
The Special forces of the Imperial Stormtrooper Corps, also known as storm commandos, used the rank to designate agents assigned to specific missions.

Special Agent was a catch-all term for Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives that filled unique posts. Greg Somax, an agent embedded at the Imperial Naval Academy, was classified as a Special Agent. They were also referred to as Special Operatives.
Ben Skywalker held it while working for the Galactic Alliance Guard.
